name: splitsio-lambda
description: An AWS Lambda job for Splits.io

scripts.docker: docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler '{"Records": [{"eventVersion": "2.0","eventTime": "1970-01-01T00:00:00.000Z","requestParameters": {"sourceIPAddress": "127.0.0.1"},"s3": {"configurationId": "testConfigRule","object": {"eTag": "0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef","sequencer": "0A1B2C3D4E5F678901","key": "splits/0002e7ae-4002-4b12-9ac7-6aa566d39bc3","size": 1024},"bucket": {"arn": "","name": "splits.io","ownerIdentity": {"principalId": "EXAMPLE"}},"s3SchemaVersion": "1.0"},"responseElements": {"x-amz-id-2": "EXAMPLE123/5678abcdefghijklambdaisawesome/mnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGH","x-amz-request-id": "EXAMPLE123456789"},"awsRegion": "us-east-1","eventName": "ObjectCreated:Put","userIdentity": {"principalId": "EXAMPLE"},"eventSource": "aws:s3"}]}'
